Wide area: Via mobile (50 watts, 1/4 wave or better): This repeater covers the Utah and Salt Lake Valleys, south along I-15 as far south as Filmore (spotty coverage,) portions of the west desert, and points north to the Idaho border. Very spotty coverage eastwards into the Wasatch. Via handie-talkie: Coverage is good in Utah county, marginal in many parts of Salt Lake county, particularly in the southern part of the valley.  Map . 90 mi radius.
Commands: While anyone may Dial In to this node, only UARC members will be given the "prefix code" that will allow them to Dial Out into the IRLP network.
